name: Global Force: New Battle Nation
description:
PlayStation Store Description (from Ad Blurbs)

To download content to the Memory Stick PRO Duo™ of your PSP® (PlayStation®Portable) system, the free space required is twice the size of the content to be downloaded.

This software is playable for PLAYSTATION®3 and PSP® (PlayStation®Portable).

To play this software on your PLAYSTATION®3 system, you must have at least 200MB of free space on your PLAYSTATION®3 system hard disk.
To play this software on your PSP®, you must install the latest system software version and have a Memory Stick Duo™ with the free space stated above.
For more detailed information about downloading to your PSP® system, please see URL below.

http://asia.playstation.com

When downloading using PC:
When downloading contents to PSP®, you must install the PLAYSTATION®Network Downloader application first. Please go to our official website for installing instructions and other information.
??

?Game description
Released in 1999, this traditional war simulation gained the highest praise of its series:
it's "GLOBAL FORCE?New Battle Nation", now available on the Downloadable Games!
The lost power balance, the shocking state of the world, the arms race between the three world powers.
The tactical battle system has been retained, and "Global Forces" has been reborn.
Dramatic visual scenes have been added to the tactical battle system.
Learn the game system in the tutorial mode,
and then use all sorts of tactics on various battle maps.

This is the ultimate war simulation, featuring 230 types of real-life weapons!

?For playing with PSP®, single player game play only and it is not compatible with multiple user play.

?PS3™ HDD and Memory Stick™ capacity requirement
